docs.text: ReLeLA The REpresentation LEarning and Natural LAnguage Processing (ReLeLa) research group located within the Deparment of Computer Science (DCC) at the University of Chile focuses on the interesection of representation learning and natural language procesing. Members Academic Staff Jorge Perez Felipe Bravo-Marquez Students Pablo Badilla Juglar Díaz Collaborators Jocelyn Durstan
